EEYE RE ENAM 15/07 RE 08.10 TA SIDUVOO SATHYA SIDUWEEMAK. MA ITHA WAGAKEEMEN ME KIYANNE. BASAYEN BESA KM1/2 PAMANA DURA ETHI PANSALAK LANGAI MAGE NIWASA THIENNE. MA EVIDAGENA YANAVITA SCOOTY WARGAYE BIKE EKAK NAWATTHA MATA NAGINNA KIWWA. BELINNAM MUSLIM THARUNAYEK. MAGE ATHATA PARSALAYAK DUNNA THIYA GANNA KIYALA. A PANSALE THARAMAK RASNEI. @Nodutu Dasun nehe .mama hari asayi kotuwe hamuduruwange bana ahanna ...minissunge hithata denenna bana kiyanne..ada rate yatharthaya me hamuduruwo kiyanne...godak aya kiyanne opa dupa kiyanawa kiyala ...eth balannako ahala poddak....namaskaraya kiyala.pansil pada paha kiyala.gatha tika kiyala..devoyanta pin dila.merichcha ayata pin dila..suwapath wewa kiyala..nawathinawa wageda ..me hamuduruwo minisunge hithata katha karanne..me wage weradi wenawa ewa nokara lassanata jiwath wenna kiyala..enisa mama hari asayi me hamuduruwange bana ahanna
